title: Definitions
context: [ยง309H-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context requires otherwise: &ldquo;Loan repayment&rdquo; or &ldquo;repayment of loan&rdquo; means the payment of up to twenty per cent of a Hawaii health corps program participant&rsquo;s health care training costs including but not limited to tuition not exceeding $35,000 per year for a maximum of five years of repayment. &ldquo;Nurse practitioner&rdquo; means a person licensed as an advanced practice registered nurse under chapter 457. &ldquo;Physician&rdquo; means a person licensed to practice medicine and surgery, as required by section 453-2. &ldquo;Physician assistant&rdquo; means a person licensed to practice medicine under the supervision of a physician or osteopathic physician, as required by section 453-5.3. &ldquo;Residency&rdquo; means a physician or nurse practitioner participating in an accredited program of post graduate study. [L 2012, c 187, pt of ยง2]
